Html:
When I had a quick glance at the code today, I didn't see anything looking like it would handle the exceptions in the UTM system. The zones for Norway deviate from everywhere else. Zone 32V is stretched further west than the other V-zones, and around Svaldbard the even numbered zones are skipped.

Will these deviations be implemented?

 

 

More information in the wikipedia article for UTM:

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Universal_Transverse_Mercator_coordinate_system

Hi,

this issue was always on our agenda. Thanks for reminding us. We will submit a patch for this soon.

Regards
